Name: Confined VR
About the game: Confined VR is a Virtual Reality Escape Room experience that traps the player in a room with a dead body, and an even deadlier puzzle! Are you perceptive enough to figure out the key to the puzzle, and escape a grisly demise?
Meta Title: Confined VR: Dec 15, 2020, Last Call Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Confined VR? Check out the release date (Dec 15, 2020), developer insights from Last Call Games, and a complete game summary.
